overview: A young boy, Facifica is raised as a girl by his mother, Aling Kobay, who had been longing for a daughter. When Facificaâ€™s mother dies, his brothers tries to teach him combat skills and how to act like a "real man." Later, he meets Pilar, a movie star that Facifica idolizes. He falls in love with her and feels the need to protect her.
title: Facifica Falayfay
